cu.explanation_en: Setting the SST to 999 exceeds the valid range (0-255), causing PLMN configuration errors and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RSRP threshold SSB to 100 exceeds the valid range (0-127), leading to improper SSB detection and cell selection failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RSRP 閾值 SSB 設定為 100 超過有效範圍 (0-127)，導致 SSB 檢測不當，並造成小區選擇失敗。
